solution_line_template: The total ratio of cattle on the farm is {cows_ratio_part}+{bulls_ratio_part} = <<{cows_ratio_part}+{bulls_ratio_part}={total_ratio_parts}>>{total_ratio_parts}

Since the fraction that represents bulls from the total ratio is {bulls_ratio_part}/{total_ratio_parts}, the number of bulls on the farm is {bulls_ratio_part}/{total_ratio_parts}*{total_cattle} = <<{bulls_ratio_part}/{total_ratio_parts}*{total_cattle}={num_bulls}>>{num_bulls}
